p: The hemp essential oil samples were submitted to colorimetric analyses and monitored for color parameters ( L*, a*, b*, C* ab and h ab) by means of a colorimeter X-Rite SP-62 (X-Rite Europe GmbH, Regensdorf, Switzerland), equipped with an integration sphere. The cylindrical coordinates C* ab and h ab were calculated. Results were expressed as the mean value Â± SD [ 13, 14].
